Paper.Title: CogentHelp: NLG meets SE in a tool for authoring dynamically generated on-line help

Section.Paragraph: CogentHelp is a prototype tool for authoring dynamically generated on-line help for applications with graphical user interfaces, embodying the "evolution-friendly" properties of tools in the literate programming tradition. In this paper, we describe CogentHelp, highlighting the usefulness of certain natural language generation techniques in supporting software-engineering goals for help authoring tools -- principally, quality and evolvability of help texts.
